q1: Can I resize to custom dimensions?
a1: Yes, you can set custom width and height, or choose from common presets like 1080p, 720p, and 480p.
a2: Downscaling preserves quality well. Upscaling may introduce some softness as the tool needs to create new pixels.
q3: What video formats can I resize?
a3: You can resize MP4, WebM, and MOV video files.
